comments:
Description:
NPE throws out when swith filter operator from isNull to IN[07]

Build number: 
2.3.0.v20071113-1114

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a CUSTOMERS Dataset from sampleDB
2, New a filter in dataset: row["CUSTOMERNUMBER"] is Null
3, Click ok to finish
4, Open the dataset again and change the operator to IN 
5, Add null in Value and click OK

Expected result:
After step4, no exception occurs, and after step5, there is only one null value in the multiple value list

Actual result:
After step4, the NPE throws out.
After step5, null;null display in the value1

Error log:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.AssertionFailedException: null argument:
org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.FilterConditionBuilder.open(FilterConditionBuilder.java:1439)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.DataSetFiltersPage.doEdit(DataSetFiltersPage.java:283)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.DataSetFiltersPage.doEdit(DataSetFiltersPage.java:273)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.DataSetFiltersPage.access$3(DataSetFiltersPage.java:262)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.data.ui.dataset.DataSetFiltersPage$4.mouseDoubleClick(DataSetFiltersPage.java:191)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.TypedListener.handleEvent(TypedListener.java:182)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.EventTable.sendEvent(EventTable.java:66)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget.sendEvent(Widget.java:947)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.runDeferredEvents(Display.java:3744)
	at org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Display.readAndDispatch(Display.java:3355)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.runEventLoop(Window.java:825)
	at org.eclipse.jface.window.Window.open(Window.java:801)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.dialogs.BaseDialog.open(BaseDialog.java:109)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.data.providers.DataSetNodeProvider.performEdit(DataSetNodeProvider.java:211)
	at org.eclipse.birt.report.designer.internal.ui.views.DefaultNodeProvider.performRequest(DefaultNodeProvider.java:371)

We will remove all the null object value from ?value1? list before set the List into TableViewer to avoid the null pointer exception.

So this bug is fixed.

Verified on v20071121-0800 build, closed
Regards!
